result.execSummary:
The defendant Brockton J Reeve was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Brockton J Reeve is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Brockton J Reeve was found guilty of Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brockton J Reeve

defendant.name: Reeve, Brockton J
defendant.address: 628 S Burr Oak Ave, Oregon, WI 53575

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: ADA motions to amend date on pg 2 of complaint from 2014 to 2013. Crt grants motion. Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights.  Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.  Waiver of Right to Attorney.

ADA stated he spoke with defn and defn wants to hear offer before deciding if he wants counsel.  Offer - plea to count 2 and dism count 1.  Defn previously had Traci Lencioni on another case.  Defn in drug court.  ADA believes defn wants STC in two weeks.  Court advised defn of right to an attorney.  Defn waives 20 day time limit for PH. Court grants motion for continuance.  Bail continued
Preliminary hearing on February 18, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant appeared.  Erin R Hanson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading.  Defendant stood mute.  Court entered not guilty plea as to any misdemeanor counts.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release.
 - Defendant shall not operate a motor vehicle.
 - Defendant shall complete the booking/fingerprinting process prior to release.
  Defendant did not waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing.
Trial judge - Br 2  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 18, 2014 at 08:30 am.

citations.chargeDescr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
